name: The Final Round
description:
Part of Konami's XXL Sports series, The Final Round is a golf game with support for up to four players that features stroke play, match play, and skins match modes.

Players can choose from one of six available generic golfers, each with differing ratings in power, technique, stability, and luck. One 3D course is available, and players must contend with the usual elements, including wind, terrain, and club selection.

The game should not be confused with Konami's arcade boxing title of the same name.

releases.country: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
